p: Depending on the plant matrix, temperature is another important parameter that is necessary in the optimization process. Increased temperature can lead to a higher solubility of the analyte, but at the same time, it can lead to the degradation of thermo-sensitive compounds [ 64]. In the processes where neoteric solvents are used, the temperature significantly modifies the properties of the solvent, thus modifying the solubility of the analytes [ 65].
